name: DodgeMath
description:
A small game made for Brackyes game jam 2021.1 in 2 days .

[ Small bug -> on fullscreen answer text is  glitching  ]

the final result of the game is way off the first Idea i had when I started working on it , but whatever :D better to be played by 2 players (one for answers , one for movement) .

HOW TO PLAY :

  • Answer as many question as you can while trying to survive
  • For each question you have limited time to answer or you get damage.
  • avoid the red balls
  • Green balls are restoring hp or increasing speed (depnds on if you are full hp)
  • Blue balls are clearing all the red balls in the field .

CONTROLS :

LEFT CLICKGO DOWNRIGHT CLICKGO UP
KEYBOARD + ENTER KEYANSWER QUESTIONS Have fun :) 

~all assets made by me / non copy right.

- music from OpenGameArt 

- character vroid studio , animations mixamo.
